tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE high_potential_employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    performance_rating INT,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    feedback TEXT,
    reviewer TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE,
    performance_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE project_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Employee (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE Department (dept_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dept_name VARCHAR(50),
  manager_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  reviewer_id INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Promotion (promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  promotion_date DATE,
  new_role VARCHAR(50),
  salary_increase DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingProgram (training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50),
  program_date DATE,
  duration_hours INT,
  trainer VARCHAR(50)
)
